availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Norman L. Price (Taylor County, Kentucky, blacksmith)

body.p: Taylor County, Kentucky, blacksmith. Kentucky native. Resident of Taylor County, Kentucky in 1850. Married to Julia A. Bottoms Price in Taylor County, Kentucky on August 7, 1862. Father of Ella N Price. Blacksmith in Taylor County, Kentucky in 1860. Signed a petition on behalf of his brother-in-law Thomas Atkinson in Taylor County, Kentucky in 1863.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Taylor, Campbellsville, p. 194B.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Taylor, Campbellsville, p. 230A.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Taylor County, Division 1, p. 111.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Taylor County Marriages, Film #000983735, p. 8.
